snippet: Frank Deford’s memoir recalls a lost era of sportswriting, when players slept in fleabag hotels and stubbed out cigarettes in the dugout.
abstract: Dwight Garner reviews book Over Time: My Life as a Sportswriter by Frank Deford.
lead_paragraph: Frank Deford’s memoir recalls a lost era of sportswriting, when players slept in fleabag hotels and stubbed out cigarettes in the dugout.

headline.seo: ‘Over Time,’ a Memoir by Frank Deford
headline.main: 50 Years of Barnstorming the Sports Beat
headline.print_headline: 50 Years of Barnstorming the Sports Beat
